column2: Ok ... the passengers ... no one is alive ... they're all dead ... you just don't know it til the end ... then you cry .
Oh hey, look, North Korea are going to kill us all; or at least some of us.
If someone in the family died you would of heard about it. Duhhhhhh. . .
wow.. tomorrow and then it's over. i'll never see some of those people again. it's kind of sad.
When life, as you know it, doesn't exist anymore.
